{"id":1127179324,"question_id":3235,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"5 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1703396594,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"12 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1127179324/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost to Convert String I","memory":"45.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long minimumCost(String source, String target, char[] original, char[] changed, int[] cost) {\n        int[][] dis = new int[26][26];\n        for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++) {\n            Arrays.fill(dis[i], Integer.MAX_VALUE);\n            dis[i][i] = 0;\n        }\n        for (int i = 0; i < cost.length; i++) {\n            dis[original[i] - 'a'][changed[i] - 'a'] = Math.min(dis[original[i] - 'a'][changed[i] - 'a'], cost[i]);\n        }\n        for (int k = 0; k < 26; k++) {\n            for (int i = 0; i < 26; i++)\n                if (dis[i][k] < Integer.MAX_VALUE) {\n                    for (int j = 0; j < 26; j++) {\n                        if (dis[k][j] < Integer.MAX_VALUE) {\n                            dis[i][j] = Math.min(dis[i][j], dis[i][k] + dis[k][j]);\n                        }\n                    }\n                }\n        }\n        long ans = 0L;\n        for (int i = 0; i < source.length(); i++) {\n            int c1 = source.charAt(i) - 'a';\n            int c2 = target.charAt(i) - 'a';\n            if (dis[c1][c2] == Integer.MAX_VALUE) {\n                return -1L;\n            } else {\n                ans += (long)dis[c1][c2];\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-to-convert-string-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
